title: Integrate Google Business Profile link and strengthen local SEO signals

requirements.text: Add the provided Google Business Profile link (https://share.google/HVERLwHNGUKinPVi1) as a visible, user-accessible link on the site, using English-only label text and matching the existing luxury styling.
acceptanceCriteria: The Footer includes a clearly labeled link (English text) that opens https://share.google/HVERLwHNGUKinPVi1 in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer".
The Contact page includes a clearly labeled link (English text) that opens https://share.google/HVERLwHNGUKinPVi1 in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer".
The new link styling is consistent with the existing black/gold luxury theme and does not introduce placeholder social links (e.g., "#") for this GBP link.

requirements.text: Add LocalBusiness structured data (JSON-LD) to the HTML head that reflects the siteâ€™s NAP details and includes the provided Google Business Profile URL as an external reference.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html includes a JSON-LD <script type="application/ld+json"> block describing the business as a LocalBusiness (or SportsActivityLocation/HealthClub) with name "Ultimate Bodybuilding World".

The JSON-LD includes the existing on-site address "Opp. Mayur Vihar Building, Birla College Road, Kalyan (W) 421301" and the published phone number currently used in the app (from frontend/src/constants/contact.ts).
The JSON-LD includes the provided Google Business Profile URL https://share.google/HVERLwHNGUKinPVi1 (e.g., via sameAs or a suitable URL field).
No user-facing text is changed to non-English as part of adding structured data.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not edit immutable hook files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor; no new backend services or external databases.
nonGoals: Guaranteeing #1 Google ranking (SEO results depend on Google indexing, competition, and Google Business Profile factors outside the website).
Adding paid ads/Google Ads campaign setup.
Integrating third-party analytics or marketing pixels.
